long_description: The Joby MPod Mini Stand holds almost any smartphone and is perfect for shooting pics and videos, watching videos, browsing online and video chatting-all hands-free. Simple, effective jaws expand with an elastic band for a gentle yet firm grasp on any phone, with or without a case; jaws hold phones up to 3.2 in. wide and 0.45 in. deep. Flexible joints and legs adapt to uneven surfaces to stabilize your camera; a rotating neck makes it easy to adjust the angle and direction of your phone. The Joby MPod Mini Stand features lightweight legs that fold together and its small size means it fits easily in your pocket or backpack.
short_description: The Joby MPod Mini Stand holds almost any smartphone and is perfect for shooting pics and videos, watching videos, browsing online and video chatting-all hands-free.
